assessmentQuestionVersion.name: ElexacaftorTezacaftorIvacaftor_InitialSubmission_Assessment_Q3
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Does the patient have a confirmed diagnosis of cystic fibrosis with at least one F508Del mutation in the CFTR gene OR at least one mutation in the CFTR gene that is responsive to Trikafta based on clinical and/or in vitro data? For the latter, please specify the evidence of responsiveness in the comments box.
